snippet.title: Cardterrupters: Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Cardterrupters draws the Fuzz Force into battle once again into a speedy new roguelite deckbuilder!
In a realtime battle system where cards take seconds to use instead of energy, plan those seconds to launch your attacks before the enemy and interrupt their turn. 

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1999660/Cardterrupters/
